level.heading: Imposition of tax.
level.text: ยง 11-1604 Imposition of tax. 1. On and after July first, nineteen hundred seventy-one, there is hereby imposed within the city and there shall be paid a tax upon every sale of a plastic container at the rate of two cents for each container sold. 2. A credit shall be allowed against the taxes imposed by this chapter of one cent for each taxable container if manufactured with a minimum of thirty per-cent of recycled material.
